short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple ChatGPT integration in page. Opens an overlay including previous questions. Right click to send marked text from the page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: I've seen a lot of non native API integration apps, and they're just not comfortable. You don't have your previous sessions and they bug out. This is why I decided to create a simple Chat GPT overlay - it puts chatGPT on top of the normal page using the website itself, meaning integration is seamless.
